actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to authorize Col. Charles Dolan, United States Air Force Reserve, to receive credit for certain activities of benefit to the United States in determining his entitlement to and amount of retired pay for nonregular service in the Armed Forces.

summary.text: Authorizes Colonel Charles Dolan, United States Air Force Reserve, to receive credit for certain activities of benefit to the United States in determining his entitlement to and amount of retired pay for nonregular service in the Armed Forces.

titles.title: A bill to authorize Col. Charles Dolan, United States Air Force Reserve, to receive credit for certain activities of benefit to the United States in determining his entitlement to and amount of retired pay for nonregular service in the Armed Forces.
